index.decription: A simple and responsive React App written with modern Javascript.
index.welcome: Welcome to my website. Please feel free to read more <about>about me</about>, or you can check out my <resume>resume</resume>, view <stats>site statistics</stats>, or <contact>contact</contact> me.

nav.description1: Hi, I'm {{firstName}}. I like building things and have been coding for {{yearsExperience}} years. I am {{lastGraduation}} at <school>{{lastGraduationSchool}}</school>.
nav.description2: Currently I am {{latCompanyPosition}} at <lastCompany>{{latCompany}}</lastCompany>. Before <lastCompany>{{latCompany}}</lastCompany> I was at <penultCompany>{{penultCompany}}</penultCompany>, <beforePenultCompany>{{beforePenultCompany}}</beforePenultCompany> and <others>others</others>.

skills.description: Note: I think these levels below are not so relevant, as it is a self-assessment and some I haven't used in a while. But it is important to inform what I have already dealt with, so <bold>I tried</bold> to give an honest view of my skills:
